text: [Music]
I was basically concerned about what was

destruction the killing of innocent

was the one thing that I did get which

and I and I felt the content of the work

and that fascinated me because I've been
you know messing around with the camera

maybe I can do something maybe I can

for of film constructively to in some

trying to make sense of that you know
could I go and speak to older and wiser

if I took that Journey you know no

hook the questions of you know is

Humanity came together separate all all

fundamental issues that Humanity faces
if we did it just for a day so I

and I wanted it to be the 21st September
because it was my granddad's favorite
number
he was a he was a prisoner of war he saw

his blood he died when he was 11 died
when I was 11 but he was like my hero
and the reason why 21 was the number is

that's why we wanted it to be the 21st

this where I actually was in the

you know it didn't matter if I didn't

I'm going to document until this becomes

we've got to do something where we unite

and it was unanimous ly adopted by every

world
yeah yeah hundreds of individuals
obviously made that a reality and thank

the world was never told there was a day

uh you know it couldn't it couldn't not

children can lead their projects they

there was this thought could it work in

yes and we found ourselves in
Afghanistan

stopping
and uh you know like the general
